mapper.insert: insert into db_happy_trade.t_user_view_history(cid, uid, `time`) values (#{cid}, #{uid}, #{time}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `time`=#{time};
mapper.select: select t_user_view_history.cid, t_user_view_history.uid, t_user_view_history.time, t_commodity.cid ccid, t_commodity.uid cuid, t_commodity.name, t_commodity.price, t_commodity.sold, t_commodity.launched, t_commodity.quality, t_commodity.time ctime, t_commodity.cover from db_happy_trade.t_user_view_history, db_happy_trade.t_commodity where t_user_view_history.cid = t_commodity.cid AND t_user_view_history.uid = #{uid}
